title: seoincorporation
author: seoincorporation
content: The reward for each mined block in dogecoin is 10,000 Doge, but i was looking to the first blocks mined in the blockchain and the reward was different, how did that happen?First block:Generation 68,416.00DOGEhttps://blockchair.com/dogecoin/block/1Second block:Generation 729,752.00DOGEhttps://blockchair.com/dogecoin/block/2third block:Generation 11,183.00DOGEhttps://blockchair.com/dogecoin/block/3Fourth block:Generation 324,378.00DOGEhttps://blockchair.com/dogecoin/block/4...Generation 863,413.00DOGEhttps://blockchair.com/dogecoin/block/6So, the question is how did that happen if the block reward is a constant in the code, can someone explain it?
